resources.string: A bird in the hand is worth 50 bucks on the black market.
When life gives you lemons, set life\'s house on fire.
An eye for an eye makes the world blind.
Don\'t eat yellow snow. It\'s pee.
Steal your enemy\'s chair for fun and profit.
So, wagon wheels are aliens? How the fuck does that make any sense?
And Christ said: don\'t be a dick.
And so long as it harms none, do as thou wilt.
Sometimes, people can be a bit shit.
